text:
Hey Greg,
The Access:VFX guys did a podcast about how to stand out at a time when things like career events are getting cancelled. Quite a lot of it applies to games as well as VFX, I reckon. Give it a look if you're interested!
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8dI3ZkDm2sY>
Cheers.

attachments.title: ACCESS:VFX Podcast - Standing Out While Staying In
attachments.fallback: YouTube Video: ACCESS:VFX Podcast - Standing Out While Staying In

text:
Another potentially interesting thing I just got sent - spreadsheet of salaries for different game industry jobs:
<https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uZF-gfBDHNJE8ebDQUFy49pwrAnCMx8uf6VzNITaOKI/edit#gid=846726335>
thanks. Uni has just moved to online teaching only.
